author: Jennifer Lecorchick
quote: You are going to hike anyway. Why not give back by walking with Walk-A-Wish? It's a no-brainer!

author: Grove Ayers
quote: Using Walk-A-Wish every day reminds me of how much a group of like-minded individuals can accomplish.

author: Deb Evans
quote: Using the Walk-A-Wish app has become a healthy addiction. My day is not complete unless I walk at least 1 mile for Walk-A-Wish.
